mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rank (id, univ_id, event_id, rank_point, win_count, lose_count) VALUES (RANK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{univId}, #{eventId}, #{rankPoint}, #{winCount}, #{loseCount})
mapper.select: SELECT univ_id, event_id, rank_point, win_count, lose_count, (win_count + lose_count) as totalCount FROM Rank WHERE event_id = #{eventId} ORDER BY rank_point DESC

SELECT univ_id, SUM(rank_point) as rankPoint, SUM(win_count) as winCount, SUM(lose_count) as loseCount, (SUM(win_count) + SUM(lose_count)) as totalCount FROM Rank GROUP BY univ_id ORDER BY rankPoint DESC
